Module booking.springboot.restserver
Package booking.springboot.restserver

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
booking.springboot.restserver.RoomService
@Service public class RoomService extends Object
A service for managing Room objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    • createRoom

      public void createRoom(int roomNumber, int roomCapacity, int pricePerNight)
      Creates a room.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the room number of the room to create.
      roomCapacity - the room capacity of the room to create.
      pricePerNight - the price per night of the room to create.

    • getAllRooms

      Gets all rooms.
      Returns:
      all rooms.

    • getRoomByNumber

      public booking.core.Room getRoomByNumber(int roomNumber)
      Gets a room by room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the room number of the room to get.
      Returns:
      the room with the given room number, or null if no room exists with that room number.

    • updateRoomByNumber

      public booking.core.Room updateRoomByNumber(int roomNumber, int roomCapacity, int pricePerNight)
      Updates a room by room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the room number of the room to update.
      roomCapacity - the new room capacity.
      pricePerNight - the new price per night.
      Returns:
      the room that was updated.

    • bookRoomByNumber

      public void bookRoomByNumber(int roomNumber, LocalDate from, LocalDate to, String username)
      Books a room by room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the room number of the room to update.
      from - the start date of the booking.
      to - the end date of the booking.
      username - the username of the user booking the room.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(booking.core.Booking booking)
      Unbooks a room by room number.
      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to cancel.
